text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The Arima Kinen is always a big event.<n>The
entrants are chosen by popular<n>vote, so the
lineup invariably ends up<n>being a who's who of
the best racers of<n>the year.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But this year, the atmosphere in the<n>stands is a
little different.

text_block_list.name: Espectador A
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf is finally taking on<n>senior-year
racers... I can't wait to see<n>how she does!

text_block_list.name: Espectador B
text_block_list.text:
Don't get your hopes up. Some of these<n>racers are
almost finished with their<n>careers. One of them's
gonna snag the<n>win, I figure.

text_block_list.name: Espectador B
text_block_list.text:
Still, she's the Emperor, right? She'll be<n>top three
for sure.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ah, regresaste. ¿Cómo está el ambiente<n>ahí afuera?

8.text:
Todos los ojos están en mí. Esperan que<n>me
mida favorablemente contra los<n>seniors, así como los
más talentosos de<n>mis contemporáneos.

8.name: Symboli Rudolf
8.text: Pero aún así, no he capturado sus<n>corazones.

8.name: Monólogo
8.text:
Symboli Rudolf came second in the fan<n>vote,
losing out to a senior-year<n>Umamusume, and it
seems to be<n>weighing on her mind.

11.text:
Una simple encuesta no puede medir<n>verdaderamente la
fe de la gente en mí, por<n>supuesto, pero el
resultado simboliza mi<n>posición actual bastante
apropiadamente.

12.text:
Muchos creen que la experiencia<n>de los seniors
presenta un obstáculo que<n>no puedo esperar
superar.

12.name: Symboli Rudolf
12.text:
Which means that they doubt my<n>abilities. And
such doubts have only one<n>remedy.
